title: 658. Teams That Could Trade Into Top 10, Trey Sermon Joins, Players to Watch at Pro Days & Jabril Cox Interview
itunes:title: 658. Teams That Could Trade Into Top 10, Trey Sermon Joins, Players to Watch at Pro Days & Jabril Cox Interview
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the guys have a discussion about the Chicago Bears reportedly trying to trade for Seattle Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson and then talk about what teams could trade into the top of the draft for a quarterback (1:02). Next, Ohio State running back Trey Sermon joins as he explains his journey from Oklahoma to Ohio State and how it has prepared him for the NFL (10:03). Then, the duo give names of players to watch at pro days (17:57). After that, LSU linebacker Jabril Cox discusses his road from North Dakota State to LSU (21:22). The pair then evaluate prospects from Georgia's pro day and also a few edge rushers (29:27). To wrap up the show, the guys answer Twitter questions (36:36). Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
